about.title: WHO ARE WE?
about.description: Kleer Infini is an Algerian tech company specializing in the development of digital and commercial solutions dedicated to national and international B2B markets. Our mission is to support the digital transformation of businesses, strengthen their export competitiveness, and provide them with concrete tools for prospecting, marketing, and commercial networking. Founded by a multidisciplinary team, Kleer Infini combines technology, international trade, and market intelligence skills to offer a unique value-added platform.
about.mission1: Simplify and modernize B2B sales, export processes, and lead generation.
about.mission2: Provide a reliable, multilingual, and constantly updated platform with decision support tools.
about.mission3: Enhance international visibility of Algerian companies through powerful digital solutions.

offer1.title: Sales & Marketing Platform
offer1.desc: Advanced search engine to filter companies and access detailed profiles.

offer2.title: B2B Digital Marketing
offer2.desc: Promotion in regional and international markets with content and targeting.

offer3.title: EasyBusiness Export
offer3.desc: Export procedures: customs, stats, regulations, docs, references.

offer4.title: Business Directory
offer4.desc: Directory structuring data by sector, region, product, etc.

about.vision: Make Kleer Infini a digital B2B leader in North Africa, connected to the world through intelligent, scalable infrastructure.
